Ingredient Name: Medium apples (e.g., Granny Smith, Honeycrisp, or a mix)
8 slices thick-cut bread (such as brioche, challah, or Texas toast)
Mixed chicken pieces (drumsticks, thighs, wings, breasts)
Slices of white or sourdough bread
Peanut oil (or other high smoke point oil)
1 (14-16 oz) block silken or medium firm tofu
2 tbsp Pixian Doubanjiang (Sichuan chili bean paste)
1/2 tsp toasted and ground Sichuan peppercorns
Large raw shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 teaspoon red chili powder (or cayenne pepper)
Extra whole wheat flour, for dusting

1 tablespoon dried fenugreek leaves (kasoori methi), crushed
2 tablespoons butter, melted (for basting) or additional oil
1 piece lemon, cut into wedges (for garnish)
1 large baguette or 1/2 loaf crusty Italian bread
Fresh mozzarella cheese (buffalo or cow's milk)
Canned whole peeled San Marzano tomatoes
Fresh mozzarella cheese (fior di latte or buffalo)
Salmon fillets, skin on or off
Sake (Japanese cooking sake, or substitute with dry white wine)
Thinly sliced pork belly or shoulder
Vegetable oil (or other neutral cooking oil)
Fresh Jajangmyeon noodles (or thick wheat noodles)
Boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1.5-inch pieces
Pork belly, skin-on or skin-off, thick cut (approx. 1-inch thick)
Black pepper, freshly ground (for pork seasoning)
Toasted sesame oil (for sesame oil salt dip)
Sea salt (for sesame oil salt dip)
Black pepper, freshly ground (for sesame oil salt dip)
Chocolate sauce or dulce de leche
ears of fresh corn on the cob, husked
Tajín seasoning or extra chili powder for dusting
Cod fillets (or other firm white fish like tilapia or mahi-mahi)
